entries.title_d: After our huge success in beating off the initial Black Sun attack they are in disarray and now is the time to strike. Assist one of Nym's fighter squadrons in delivering vengeance upon the Black Sun.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Bring the battle back to the Black Sun.
entries.quest_location_d: You are entering hostile sectors of the Dathomir system. Stay sharp and be prepared for attack.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Assist the gathered Nym and Alliance fighters in destroying the present Black Sun vessels.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: Recon ships have detected Black Sun precense in this area. Proceed to the location immediately.
entries.found_loc: Proceed to this location to meet up with us.
entries.enemies_win: Pull out! This battle is lost and...
entries.enemies_remain: Nym Pirate Squad Leader: < Haha take that you Black Sun loosers! Only %DI left guys! >
entries.enemies_arrived: Hostile vessel activity confirmed in target area.
entries.battle_started: Lets bring it to them boys!
entries.allies_win: Great job guys, the Black Sun should think twice before they try something like this again. Return to base everyone.
entries.allies_remain: Nym Pilot: < I'm going down! Make them pay bo... >
entries.allies_arrived: We have arrived, join up pilot.
